C

com.addicticks.net.httpsupload - package com.addicticks.net.httpsupload
Classes that support uploading a file (or files) to a remote server using either HTTP or HTTPS.
CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS - Static variable in class com.addicticks.net.httpsupload.HttpsFileUploaderConfig
Default connect timeout on the URL connection.
